TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SigningCredentials extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用來產生數位簽章的密碼編譯演算法以及安全性演算法。

span.span: Represents the cryptographic key and security algorithms that are used to generate a digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別，即可指定 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 用來產生 之數位簽章的簽署金鑰、簽署金鑰識別碼以及安全性演算法。Use the class to specify the signing key, signing key identifier, and security algorithms that are used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to generate the digital signature for a . 為了設定數位簽章的詳細資料，此時會設定 類別的 屬性。To set the digital signature details, set the property of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public SigningCredentials (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey signingKey, string signatureAlgorithm, string digestAlgorithm);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey signingKey, string signatureAlgorithm, string digestAlgorithm) cil managed
Public Sub New (signingKey As SecurityKey, signatureAlgorithm As String, digestAlgorithm As String)
public: SigningCredentials(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKey ^ signingKey, System::String ^ signatureAlgorithm, System::String ^ digestAlgorithm);

param.name: signingKey
param.span: ，其中包含用來產生數位簽章的密碼編譯金鑰。

span.span: A that contains the cryptographic key that is used to generate the digital signature.

param.name: signatureAlgorithm
param.span: 表示密碼編譯演算法的 URI，此演算法會用來產生數位簽章。

span.span: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to generate the digital signature.

param.name: digestAlgorithm
param.span: 表示密碼編譯演算法的 URI，此演算法會用來計算要被數位簽署之 SOAP 訊息部分的摘要。

span.span: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to compute the digest for the portion of the SOAP message that is to be digitally signed.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別，即可指定 `signatureAlgorithm` 和 `digestAlgorithm` 參數。Use the class to specify the `signatureAlgorithm` and `digestAlgorithm` parameters. 類別，其中包含用來表示密碼編譯演算法的一組靜態常數字串。The class contains a set of static, constant strings that represent cryptographic algorithms. 擁有 `Signature` 後置字元的成員可以用來指定 `signatureAlgoritm` 參數，而擁有 `Digest` 後置字元的成員可以用來指定 `digestAlgorithm` 參數。The members that have a `Signature` suffix can be used to specify the `signatureAlgoritm` parameter and the members that have a `Digest` suffix can be used to specify the `digestAlgorithm` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public SigningCredentials (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey signingKey, string signatureAlgorithm, string digestAlgorithm, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier signingKeyIdentifier);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey signingKey, string signatureAlgorithm, string digestAlgorithm, class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier signingKeyIdentifier) cil managed
Public Sub New (signingKey As SecurityKey, signatureAlgorithm As String, digestAlgorithm As String, signingKeyIdentifier As SecurityKeyIdentifier)

public: SigningCredentials(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKey ^ signingKey, System::String ^ signatureAlgorithm, System::String ^ digestAlgorithm, System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifier ^ signingKeyIdentifier);

param.name: signingKey
param.span: ，其中包含用來產生數位簽章的密碼編譯金鑰。

span.span: A that contains the cryptographic key that is used to generate the digital signature.

param.name: signatureAlgorithm
param.span: 表示密碼編譯演算法的 URI，此演算法會用來產生數位簽章。

span.span: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to generate the digital signature.

param.name: digestAlgorithm
param.span: 表示密碼編譯演算法的 URI，此演算法會用來計算要被數位簽署之 SOAP 訊息部分的摘要。

span.span: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm that is used to compute the digest for the portion of the SOAP message that is to be digitally signed.

param.name: signingKeyIdentifier
param.span: ，其中指定表示金鑰的識別碼，該金鑰會用來建立數位簽章。

span.span: A that specifies the identifier that represents the key that is used to create a digital signature.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別，即可指定 `signatureAlgorithm` 和 `digestAlgorithm` 參數。Use the class to specify the `signatureAlgorithm` and `digestAlgorithm` parameters. 類別，其中包含用來表示密碼編譯演算法的一組靜態常數字串。The class contains a set of static constant strings that represent cryptographic algorithms. 擁有 `Signature` 後置字元的成員可以用來指定 `signatureAlgoritm` 參數，而擁有 `Digest` 後置字元的成員可以用來指定 `digestAlgorithm` 參數。The members that have a `Signature` suffix can be used to specify the `signatureAlgoritm` parameter and the members that have a `Digest` suffix can be used to specify the `digestAlgorithm` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了設定 屬性，此時會使用其中一個會接受 `digestAlgorithm` 參數的建構函式。To set the property, use one of the constructors that take a `digestAlgorithm` parameter.
